<h3 id="X31728">X(31728) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: CIRCUMORTHIC AND 1st CIRCUMPERP</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^6-3*(b^4+c^4)*a^4+(b+c)*b^2*c^2*a^3+(3*b^4+3*c^4+(6*b^2+7*b*c+6*c^2)*b*c)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b^2*c^2*a-(b^6-c^6)*(b^2-c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31728) = X(1)-3*X(5890) = 3*X(51)-2*X(18483) = 3*X(165)-X(11412) = 3*X(185)+X(16980) = 3*X(568)-X(12699) = 3*X(568)-2*X(31757) = 2*X(1125)-3*X(9730) = 2*X(1216)-3*X(10164) = 5*X(1698)-3*X(11459) = 3*X(1699)-5*X(3567) = 3*X(3576)-5*X(10574) = 7*X(3624)-9*X(15045) = 4*X(3634)-3*X(5891) = 3*X(3817)-4*X(5462) = 3*X(5587)-X(12111) = X(5882)-4*X(13382) = 6*X(5892)-5*X(19862) = 2*X(5907)-3*X(10175) = 3*X(5946)-2*X(9955) = 9*X(7988)-11*X(15024)</b>
<p>X(31728) lies on these lines:
{1,5890}, {2,31751}, {3,31738}, {4,31760}, {40,5889}, {51,18483}, {52,516}, {65,2779}, {143,22793}, {165,11412}, {185,515}, {378,16473}, {389,946}, {511,31730}, {517,6102}, {568,12699}, {974,11709}, {1125,9730}, {1154,3579}, {1216,10164}, {1385,13630}, {1614,9590}, {1698,11459}, {1699,3567}, {2781,4663}, {2948,12284}, {3576,10574}, {3624,15045}, {3634,5891}, {3817,5462}, {5562,6684}, {5587,12111}, {5663,18480}, {5691,6241}, {5876,9956}, {5882,13382}, {5892,19862}, {5907,10175}, {5946,9955}, {6000,31673}, {6101,31663}, {7722,13211}, {7731,9904}, {7988,15024}, {7989,15058}, {8185,11456}, {8227,15043}, {9572,11460}, {9577,11461}, {9587,11464}, {9621,11449}, {9729,10165}, {10263,28146}, {10575,28164}, {10625,12512}, {11230,12006}, {11231,11591}, {11444,31423}, {11561,11699}, {11720,14708}, {11806,13605}, {12162,19925}, {12270,12407}, {13369,23156}, {13491,28160}, {14449,28178}, {14831,28194}, {15305,18492}, {18436,26446}</p>
<p>
X(31728) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {40, 5889}, {2948, 12284}, {5691, 6241}, {7722, 13211}, {7731, 9904}, {12270, 12407}<br>
X(31728) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 31760), (946, 389), (1385, 13630), (5562, 6684), (5876, 9956), (6101, 31663), (10625, 12512), (11699, 11561), (11709, 974), (11720, 14708), (12162, 19925), (12699, 31757), (13605, 11806), (18436, 31752), (22793, 143), (23156, 13369), (31732, 6102), (31737, 3579), (31738, 3)<br>
X(31728) = anticomplement of X(31751)<br>
X(31728) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (568, 12699, 31757), (18436, 26446, 31752)<br>
</p>
